attributes.additional_details:
Basically its really upsetting that the killing of other humans is still happening in 2017, you wonder why terrorist groups are popping up left right and centre? its because we blow everything up,everything. please stop it.its not fair,its not nice,and its not making the world a better place. why should OUR tax go towards such animalistic and barbaric things.

the people doing these horrible inhumane things should be held accountable for the actions,and get sentenced and punished fairly.
attributes.background: I,and who ever signs this petition would like the british government to stop bombing and killing people in other countries. As its 2017 and this should not be happening anymore,we are sick of seeing pictures of dead babies,children and adults. Do you people have any empathy towards our fellow human?
